description: Number of regular triangulations of triangle X n-simplex.
references: Gelfand, Kapranov and Zelevinsky, Discriminants, Resultants and Multidimensional Determinants, Birkhauser, 1994, pp. 243-250.
J. A de Loera, Nonregular triangulations of products of simplices, Discrete Comp. Geom., 15 (1996), 253-264.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
